description: The AmazonBasics RCA Component Video Cable provides outstanding video quality, letting you create a movie-theater experience in your home. Intended for connecting DVD and Blu-Ray players, satellite receivers, video game consoles, and cable boxes to HDTVs and video projectors.AmazonBasics RCA Component Video Cable features high-quality gold-plated connectors that resist corrosion and offer superb audio and video quality.Recommended Uses:Connecting DVD and Blu-Ray players, satellite receivers, and cable boxes to HDTVs and video projectorsHelping create a movie-theater experience in your homeTechnical Specifications:Connector Type: 3RCA-3RCA, two-shot moldingConnector Plating: Gold PlatingCable Length: 6 ft./1.8 mJacket: PVC, blackWarranty: AmazonBasics 1-Year LimitedWarranty[PDF]Documentation:Helpful Hints[PDF]Design Offers Maximum Signal StrengthWhen you are connecting your sources, such as Blu-Ray or DVD players, to your high-definition television (HDTV), it is important that the video signal stays as clean as possible. The AmazonBasics RCA Component Video Cable helps you meet this demand and maximize your HDTV signal and performance.The AmazonBasics RCA Component Video Cable features a nitrogen-injected polyethylene foam dialectric. This means that you'll get continual high-level signal strength for a consistent picture, no matter how you run the cable.Shielding and Gold-Plated Connectors for Signal PurityThe AmazonBasics RCA Component Video Cable features both foil and braided shielding with a durable, black PVC outer layer. The shielding provides defense against outside interference and helps maintain the integrity and purity of the video signal.The cable also features gold-plated connectors that resist corrosion while offering optimal signal transfer with lower distortion at the point of contact. The end result is picture quality that is faithful to the original.AmazonBasics: Quality Products at Low PricesAmazonBasics is a collection of consumer electronic "basics" created by combining quality and low prices for an overall focus on value.Warranty and Helpful HintsThis cable is backed by an AmazonBasics 1-year limited warranty. To view the full AmazonBasics warranty,click here. If you are having trouble connecting your components with this cable,click herefor the AmazonBasics Components Cable Helpful Hints Guide [PDF].What's in the BoxRCA component video cable (6 feet / 1.8 meters) and warranty card.
title: AmazonBasics 3RCA Component Video Cable -  6 Feet (1.8 Meters)
